mapper.sql: REG_ID, TEMP_ID, REG_CODE, REG_NAME, REMARK, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_tem_reg_tb
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.update: UPDATE ht_tem_reg_tb SET OP_TYPE = 'D' where REG_ID = #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into ht_tem_reg_tb (REG_ID, TEMP_ID, REG_CODE, REG_NAME, REMARK, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID) values (#{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tempId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ht_tem_reg_tb
REG_ID,
TEMP_ID,
REG_CODE,
REG_NAME,
REMARK,
OP_TYPE,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
CREATOR_ID,
MODIFIER_ID,

#{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update ht_tem_reg_tb
REG_ID = #{record.regId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TEMP_ID = #{record.tempId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REG_CODE = #{record.regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_NAME = #{record.regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ht_tem_reg_tb set REG_ID = #{record.regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TEMP_ID = #{record.tempId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REG_CODE = #{record.regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_NAME = #{record.regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_tem_reg_tb
TEMP_ID = #{tempId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
REG_CODE = #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REG_NAME = #{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where REG_ID = #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ht_tem_reg_tb set TEMP_ID = #{tempId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, REG_CODE = #{regCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REG_NAME = #{regName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where REG_ID = #{regId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select tem_reg.REG_ID, tem_reg.REG_NAME, tem_reg.REG_CODE from ht_tem_reg_tb tem_reg left join ht_templet_tb templet on tem_reg.TEMP_ID=templet.TEMP_ID where templet.TEMP_CODE=#{code} AND tem_reg.OP_TYPE!='D' AND templet.OP_TYPE!='D'

SELECT DISTINCT A.REG_ID AS REG_ID, A.REG_NAME AS REG_NAME, A.REG_CODE AS REG_CODE FROM ht_tem_reg_tb A LEFT JOIN ht_tar_reg_tb B ON B.REG_ID = A.REG_ID LEFT JOIN ht_plate_one_tar_tb C ON C.TARGET_CODE = B.TARGET_CODE LEFT JOIN ht_cust_plate_tb D ON D.PLATE_ID = C.PLATE_ID LEFT JOIN ht_templet_tb E ON E.TEMP_ID = A.TEMP_ID WHERE E.TEMP_CODE = 'TEMP03' AND D.PLATE_ID = #{blockId} AND A.OP_TYPE != 'D' AND B.OP_TYPE != 'D' AND C.OP_TYPE != 'D' AND D.OP_TYPE != 'D' AND E.OP_TYPE != 'D' UNION SELECT DISTINCT A.REG_ID AS REG_ID, A.REG_NAME AS REG_NAME, A.REG_CODE AS REG_CODE FROM ht_tem_reg_tb A LEFT JOIN ht_tar_reg_tb B ON B.REG_ID = A.REG_ID LEFT JOIN ht_plate_two_tar_tb C ON C.TARGET_CODE = B.TARGET_CODE LEFT JOIN ht_plate_two_tar_gro_tb D ON D.PTTG_ID = C.PTTG_ID LEFT JOIN ht_cust_plate_tb E ON E.PLATE_ID = D.PLATE_ID LEFT JOIN ht_templet_tb F ON F.TEMP_ID = A.TEMP_ID WHERE F.TEMP_CODE = 'TEMP03' AND E.PLATE_ID = #{blockId} AND A.OP_TYPE != 'D' AND B.OP_TYPE != 'D' AND C.OP_TYPE != 'D' AND D.OP_TYPE != 'D' AND E.OP_TYPE != 'D' AND F.OP_TYPE != 'D'
